body_html:
At least in the initial version, avgpooling_op.cc did not compile with MSVC. I'm not at a computer right now, but could you try commenting out the line

      "${tensorflow_source_dir}/tensorflow/core/kernels/avgpooling_op.*"

from the tf_core_kernels_windows_exclude_srcs definition you pasted above, and report the error (if any)?
body_text:
At least in the initial version, avgpooling_op.cc did not compile with MSVC. I'm not at a computer right now, but could you try commenting out the line
      "${tensorflow_source_dir}/tensorflow/core/kernels/avgpooling_op.*"

from the tf_core_kernels_windows_exclude_srcs definition you pasted above, and report the error (if any)?
body:
At least in the initial version, `avgpooling_op.cc` did not compile with MSVC. I'm not at a computer right now, but could you try commenting out the line 

```
      "${tensorflow_source_dir}/tensorflow/core/kernels/avgpooling_op.*"
```

from the `tf_core_kernels_windows_exclude_srcs` definition you pasted above, and report the error (if any)?
